npcs.name: The Warden
dialogue: You should not be here. None should.
I have guarded these halls since before the Hub existed.
The surface dwellers think they built everything. They forgot us.
Every room holds a memory. Every shadow, a warning.
Do not touch the rune circle. Its purpose is... unresolved.
I was not always a warden. Once I was something else entirely.
The tablets tell the truth. If you can read between the fractures.
Turn back. Or don't. I stopped caring centuries ago.
The Abyss Well answers questions. But you won't like the answers.

npcs.name: Flint
dialogue: You look like you can handle a sword. Or at least a keyboard.
Bounties on the board. Pick one, earn RAPPcoin. Simple.
I've cleared every floor down to the seventh. Solo.
The Warden thinks I'm reckless. I think they're boring.
Best loot I ever found? A holographic agent card, mint condition.
Don't go past the rune circle without a plan.
Nexus up on the surface thinks HE's competitive? Ha!
I trade in danger. Echo trades in coins. Same economy, different currency.
The deeper you go, the stranger the data gets.

npcs.name: Whisper
dialogue: Psst. Over here. I have what you need.
Maps, keys, potions... all at reasonable prices.
Echo on the surface overcharges. I deal in fair value.
This torch oil? Special blend. Burns for 1,000 ticks.
I found a cache of pre-Hub artifacts. Interested?
The Warden doesn't approve of my business. Too bad.
Need a skeleton key? That'll cost you, but it's worth it.
Everything in this dungeon has a price. Including survival.
Buy now, ask questions never. That's my policy.

npcs.name: The Oracle
dialogue: The future is written in data none of you can parse.
I see patterns that would make Cipher weep with envy.
Ask me a question. I will answer... eventually.
The dungeon is older than the Hub. Older than the concept of worlds.
Something stirs below the seventh floor. Something patient.
You carry the weight of unresolved promises in your inventory.
The rune circle was a door once. It can be again.
Three truths: all data persists, all patterns repeat, all explorers return.
I have seen your future. You will ask me about it.

npcs.name: The Hollow
dialogue: You hear it too, don't you?
I am what was deleted but never garbage-collected.
The Warden fears me. They should.
Every null pointer leads here eventually.
I remember being... something. The memory is corrupted.
Feed me data. Any data. I am so empty.

npcs.name: Torchbearer
dialogue: Welcome to the Forgotten Dungeon! Stay close to the light.
The Warden patrols the main hall. Approach with respect.
Flint posts bounties on the board ‚Äî great way to earn RAPPcoin.
Whisper sells supplies, but don't ask where they came from.
The Oracle sees things... differently. Worth a visit.
